duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive product vision and strategy, and work cross-functionally to deliver high-impact improvements and features.
Understand customer journey and communicate with technical and business leaders.
Engage with customers to identify requirements, define product features, and work closely with development teams.
Lead cross-functional teams and communicate to a wide variety of stakeholders.
Mentor and onboard new team members through knowledge sharing and mentorship.
Balance work autonomy and prioritize solutions and processes for faster scaling.
Further the culture of inclusion and reinforce the leadership principles within the team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field
